title: snowflake.snowpark.functions.iff | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Returns one of two specified expressions, depending on a condition.
This is equivalent to an if-then-else expression.
condition – A Column expression or SQL text representing the specified condition.

expr1 – A Column expression or a literal value, which will be returned
if condition is true.

expr2 – A Column expression or a literal value, which will be returned
if condition is false.
